entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
